Давно играл, купил. Всё по кайфу и мне по нраву. Если пк не тянет cs:go, то можно играть и в source, в целом махаться приятно, но а вообще кому как. Радует разнообразие серверов, но если кто не в курсе здесь нет ранговой игры и ранговой системы в целом (кроме плагинов на серверах).
bon jeu indemodable il restera toujour dans lair du temps je recommande fortement a tout les fans de la franchise
Gerçekten inanılmaz bir nostaji eski diyip geçmeyin zaten serverlar var ama arkadaşlarınızla yada arkadaşsız çok güzel vakit geçirebilirsiniz eski ama hala çok güzel bir oyun hala oynanır

Imagine a world where iron sights are useless, humans are bullet sponges, and guns are inaccurate as hell.... all of that sounds bad, but trust me this is an experience! I give you Counter Strike Source, a 20 year old game with a playerbase double the age. Tons of free mods and servers, a great community, and overall stupid fun. Also gmod is unplayable ftmp without this game. Play it now! (only $9.99 + shipping and handling)
Before playing this, i had a small pp and after, I had a big pp. Joking aside, this is an amazing game for PCs/Laptops that cant run CS:GO like my IGPU laptop. I recommend this for lower end systems!
Si piensa que es como el Cs 1.6 pero con mejores graficos pues te equivocas, ya que este juego te da una experiencia distinta al clasico Cs 1.6.
